rows.label: tlk70000120_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Raaaugh!
I've come up with a new special move!
It's called the "Elba Burning Slash!"

rows.label: tlk70000120_02_msg0002
rows.name:
What? No! Not "elbow"! Elba!
And not "burning trash", Burning Slash!
Like with a sword!

rows.label: tlk70000120_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Just forget it... By the way, did you
know you can chain up Specials if
you have allies? Amazing!

rows.label: tlk70000120_02_msg0004
rows.name:
There are certain chains of elements
and whatnot that work especially well!

rows.label: tlk70000120_02_msg0005
rows.name:
I've no idea about those chains myself,
but one day I'll be the greatest combo
master Gula's ever seen!
